DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; UKRAINE ; CHERNOBYL REACTORS UNSAFE , AGENCY SAYS
DOC.TEXT: The Chernobyl nuclear_power plant , site of the world ' s worst nuclear disaster , remains unsafe , the United Nations ' nuclear watchdog said.Harsh weather has caused serious deterioration , such_as gaps in the concrete shell sealing_off the Chernobyl nuclear_reactor that exploded in 1986 , the International Atomic Energy Agency warned . Inspectors also found " numerous safety deficiencies " in the two reactors still operating at the Ukrainian plant . The U.N. agency said experts will probably meet in April to discuss solutions .
